<style>
.gallery-container {
  column-count: 3;
  column-gap: 20px;
}
.gallery-item {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  break-inside: avoid;
}
.gallery-item img {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  border-radius: 8px;
  display: block;
}
.caption {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  color: white;
  padding: 12px;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}
.gallery-item:hover .caption {
  opacity: 1;
}
</style>
